sen.j: 官務の地位を対立する壬生官務家が握り、上首である長興が任命されなかったことに反発して、室町幕府に直訴する。
sen.e: He objected and made a direct appeal to the Muromachi Bakufu that Mibu-kanmu family exclusively possessed the official position of kanmu and he had not been appointed, in spite of his superiority.

sen.j: その結果、文安2年（1445年）2月に小槻氏氏長者・官務に任じられる。
sen.e: As a result, he was appointed the kanmu, Uji no Choja (a common clan chieftain) of the Ozuki clan in 1445.

sen.e: Nagaoki tried to oppose to Mibu-kanmu family by serving Konoe family and Ichijo family as Keishi (household superintendent) and maintaining the relationship with Muromachi Bakufu.

sen.e: The duty of the kanmu had been mainly to carry out ceremonies and public affairs and to investigate the required precedents, therefore the loss of archives and ancient documents which could be the source of precedents was a critical damage for Omiya family.
